elements.label: Guerilla Tactics
elements.description: We are no standing army or militant insurgent force. Desperation will force us to be ingenious with our strategies - or inhuman.

elements.label: Neutral
elements.description: Not a friend, nor an enemy. [You might broker a temporary alliance with certain Neutral combatants by offering something of value.]

elements.label: Tentative Ally
elements.description: We may not have an especial fondness for one another, but we have a sort of understanding. [You have purchased this one's cooperation, for now. They will not follow you out of the Warzone, refuse to participate in certain tactics, and may leave your service if you perform certain heinous actions. If exhausted, they must be recruited again to be put to use; if wounded, they will die.]

elements.label: Vicious
elements.description: This one has no qualms with doing the unspeakable.

elements.label: Repulsed
elements.description: I've driven this one away. [You cannot form an alliance with someone who possesses this aspect.]

elements.label: Already Searched
elements.description: We have already looked this one over for anything useful they might have had when they died.

elements.label: Where Wolves Walk
elements.description: There are Wolves about in this place.

elements.label: Hatred: Those Guilty
elements.description: Hooked cross, black eagle. Barbed wire and bootheel. They piled our dead by the dozen in graves too shallow for dogs. I will make them understand what they have done to me. I will make them understand.

elements.label: Hatred: Those Complicit
elements.description: Mankind - you good and you innocent, comfortable in your beds. We cried out to you and you did not hear. Under your sleeping eye we worked and starved and burned til nothing remained of us, not even our names. You cannot see the blood on your hands - but you will answer for it.

elements.label: Hatred: Self
elements.description: Creature. Hated like a beast and hateful like a man. Can you recall a joy you did not find in blood? The face of your mother? When the world burns on the pyre, know that you will deserve to burn with it.

elements.label: Hidden
elements.description: My Ally has secured an advantageous position in the shadows. [This Ally cannot be targeted by most Enemy actions, and its aspects have increased significantly. This Ally will revert to its normal state once used or injured.]

elements.label: Shrine: Wolf-Divided
elements.description:
'The Wolf has no need for secrets or doctrines because he is self-evident. Inflict pain on your enemy, and he will strive to inflict it back upon you; suffer at the hands of another, and you will learn to hate them. Hatred is a sweet flame in the hearts of men. Hatred is the truth of the world. If you want to learn anything from the Wolf, begin there.'

- #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#, the Exile

elements.label: A Glorious Infliction
elements.description: If I used this weapon on myself, I would die following a very intense period of agony. If I used it upon myself in the presence of the Wolf, the agony could bring me an altogether different kind of change.
